name: Martina Camargo
description: '''Martina Camargo Centeno'''{{family name footnote|Camargo|Centeno|lang=Spanish}} (born 1960) is a Colombian singer and songwriter. She has been active in music since the 1980s and has released five albums, most recently ''Canto y RÃ­o'' (2024) which was nominated for a [[Latin Grammy]].
